show_name: Yuuki Yuuna wa Yuusha de Aru
other_title: Yuki Yuna wa Yusha de Aru
結城友奈は勇者である
opening_theme: #1: "Hoshi to Hana (ホシトハナ)" by Sanshuu Chuugaku Yuusha-bu (讃州中学勇者部) (Haruka Terui, Suzuko Mimori, Yumi Uchida, Tomoyo Kurosawa) (ep 2-3)
#2: "Hoshi to Hana (ホシトハナ)" by Sanshuu Chuugaku Yuusha-bu (讃州中学勇者部) (Haruka Terui, Suzuko Mimori, Yumi Uchida, Tomoyo Kurosawa, Juri Nagatsuma) (ep 4-12)
ending_theme: #1: "Hoshi to Hana (ホシトハナ)" by Sanshuu Chuugaku Yuusha-bu (讃州中学勇者部) (Haruka Terui, Suzuko Mimori, Yumi Uchida, Tomoyo Kurosawa) (ep 1)
#2: "Aurora Days" by Sanshuu Chuugaku Yuusha-bu (讃州中学勇者部) (Haruka Terui, Suzuko Mimori, Yumi Uchida, Tomoyo Kurosawa) (ep 2)
#3: "Aurora Days" by Sanshuu Chuugaku Yuusha-bu (讃州中学勇者部) (Haruka Terui, Suzuko Mimori, Yumi Uchida, Tomoyo Kurosawa, Juri Nagatsuma) (eps 3, 5-8, 12)
#4: "Inori no Uta acoustic guitar ver (祈りの歌 acoustic guitar ver)" by Itsuki Inubouzaki (Tomoyo Kurosawa) (ep 4)
#5: "Inori no Uta (祈りの歌)" by Itsuki Inubouzaki (Tomoyo Kurosawa) (ep 9)
